text: In Which We Serve is a 1942 British World War II movie directed by first time director David Lean and starring NoÃ«l Coward, Bernard Miles, John Mills, Celia Johnson, Joyce Carey, Kay Walsh, Michael Wilding, Leslie Dwyer, James Donald, Richard Attenborough, Kathleen Harrison, Daniel Massey, Juliet Mills. It was distributed by United Artists and was nominated for 2 Academy Awards in 1944. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1942 war movies Category:British war movies Category:World War II movies Category:Movies directed by David Lean
title: In Which We Serve
